tweet_text: @Jekajojo @NorthEastOracle @WhiteHouse Because they're putting more at risk. The rate on capital gains is intentionally lower to encourage people taking the risk investing their money.  They're not going to invest if the tax rate is high and wipes out the chance to earn a profit. People don't invest to earn nothing.
text_en: Because they're putting more at risk. The rate on capital gains is intentionally lower to encourage people taking the risk investing their money. They're not going to invest if the tax rate is high and wipes out the chance to earn a profit. People don't invest to earn nothing.
